article_title: Nurse Practitioners And Physician Assistants Win Prescribing Authority Milestone

article_metadata.description: Florida will allow nurse practitioners and physician assistants prescribing authority for controlled substances, making it the 50th state to allow NPs to do so. Meanwhile, just one state - Kentucky - prevents PAs from prescribing controlled substances.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Florida will allow nurse practitioners and physician assistants prescribing authority for controlled substances, making it the 50th state to allow NPs to do so. Meanwhile, just one state - Kentucky - prevents PAs from prescribing controlled substances.
